Developers' Guide
=================

This Developers' Guide, as the name suggests, provides a high-level description
of the main groups of components comprising the Afterburner software framework,
together with guidance on how these components can be assembled to create versatile
and efficient scientific applications.

The Guide is aimed at mainstream software engineers and also scientists with Python
code development experience. It is best read in combination with the
:doc:`/apiref`.
